experience: You and Allison both know Chris Cox, Jason Stomel, and 9 others

NURO is a fast growing, stealth-mode start-up in the Robotics and AI space. We are actively hiring curious and talented engineers and researchers with interest in robotics, AI and machine learning.  If you would like to hear more about the future we are building, please drop me a note to allison@nuro.ai

Lytro is revolutionizing the imaging industry with Light Field enabled hardware and software for an entire new generation of applications for photography, video, 3D, virtual reality (and more).  We are well funded by top VCs Andreessen-Horowitz, Greylock Partners, NEA, & North Bridge Venture Partners and have attracted a world-class team from companies like Apple, Google, nVidia, and Facebook.  We have built a strong, diverse culture centered on innovation and collaboration. Lytro’s Light Field platform has the potential to become ubiquitous in the years to come and our product and engineering teams are already hard at work on what’s coming next - It is an exciting time to join us as we continue to ignite the living picture revolution.

Scaled teams for high- growth start-ups backed by top tier VCs.  Focued on recruiting purely passive, cross functional candidates across various technology sectors including Web, Mobile, Cloud, Virtualization, Social Media, SaaS, Big data, Business Intelligence, Data Warehousing, Networking, Wireless, Information Security, Web Content Management etc.

•	Consistent top performer/revenue generator within high-technology contingency firm•	Sourced and placed passive candidates including sales executives, product managers and system and pre-sales engineers
Organizational and Interpersonal Communication & Theatre Arts
